title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: download, build and run large language models locally via a simple CLI and REST API.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library for chatting, generating embeddings, pulling models and managing Ollama instances.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same generate/chat/embed API as Python lib.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration that wraps Ollama models for chains, agents, retrieval and RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Drop-in ChatGPT-style web interface for Ollama; supports multi-user, model pulls, code highlighting, dark mode.

title: ollama4j – Java Ollama Client
summary: Unofficial Java/Kotlin SDK that wraps the Ollama REST API with sync/async builders and embedding helpers.

title: ollama-cli (mattw/ollama-cli)
summary: Rich interactive terminal UI (TUI) for browsing, chatting, and managing Ollama models powered by Charm/Bubbletea.

title: ollama-rag – Minimal RAG example
summary: Official demo repo showing how to build a retrieval-augmented generation pipeline with Ollama embeddings.

title: ollama-copilot.nvim
summary: Neovim plugin that turns any Ollama model into a code-copilot with inline suggestions and chat window.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama (with optional WebUI) on Kubernetes clusters via single command.

title: ollama-camunda – AI workers for Camunda 8
summary: Community project that exposes Ollama models as Camunda 8 job-workers for summarisation, classification, etc.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: Official n8n node that integrates Ollama chat & generate actions into no-code automation workflows.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.x integration providing OllamaGenerator & OllamaChatGenerator for building LLM pipelines.

title: ollama-rs – Rust client
summary: Unofficial async Rust crate that wraps the Ollama REST API with strongly-typed request/response models.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: One-command docker-compose stack bundling Ollama server, CUDA runtime, and WebUI with GPU passthrough.

title: ollama-litellm-proxy
summary: LiteLLM proxy example that exposes any Ollama model behind an OpenAI-compatible endpoint for drop-in SDK use.

title: ollama-telegram-bot
summary: Python Telegram bot that chats with local Ollama models, supports group threads, streaming and markdown.

title: ollama-fastapi
summary: Lightweight FastAPI micro-service that wraps Ollama with extra auth, rate-limiting and request logging.

title: ollama-vscode
summary: VS Code extension that adds an Ollama chat sidebar and code-completion provider using any local model.

title: ollama-rustic – Rust TUI dashboard
summary: Experimental Rust terminal dashboard for monitoring GPU/CPU usage and chatting with Ollama models.
